bibl.title: Commodus as Diplomat in an Extract from the Acta Senatus.
bibl.note: Revised text and interpretation of Ch.L.A. IV, 268 (= P. Bodl. Ms.Lat.class. d. 11). Private copy of part of the senate's proceedings. It records part of the formal conclusion of peace with the Buri after the return of Commodus to Rome in 180. Fayum, 180-191.
Talbert R.J.A., Commodus as Diplomat in an Extract from the Acta Senatus.
